clauses.title: Scope of Work
clauses.summary: Deloitte will provide strategic consulting services including business process optimization.

clauses.title: Payment Terms
clauses.summary: Fees are milestone-based, payable within 30 days of invoice.

clauses.title: Termination
clauses.summary: Either party can terminate with 30 days written notice.

insights.message: Milestone-based payment ensures predictable cash flow.
Scope changes require formal change requests to avoid disputes.

evidence.snippet: Consulting services include strategy, process optimization, and implementation advisory.
Invoices are payable within 30 days of issuance; milestones are clearly defined.
